name: Find the Object Game: 3x3 Speech Grid
description:
3 Programs that implement a description for an object that can move freely in a 3x3 grid. The three programs are:

1) Bounds: Sets up the bounding areas for the 3x3 grid and adds visual rectangles to show them.
2) Movable Object: A circle that moves with the paper. When it moves, it will voice its current grid position.
3) Movable Cupcake: A cupcake image that moves with paper position. When the cupcake and movable object are in the same grid cell, that information will be voiced.
keyWords: description, grid, 2D, freeform, movement, described, voicing
